name: Cryptostone
description: In the CRYPTOSTONE ecosystem, you can use our crypto payment gateway on your website to provide an alternative payment method for your customers. with our centralized exchange, you can trade easily and anonymously in a safe way while with our decentralized exchange you can even launch your exchange and trade in a fully decentralized and peer-to-peer way. Decentralized Worldwide Stock Market is another platform that is provided by us to facilitate fundraising events to our customers, which makes the fundraising and investment process inclusive and accessible based on decentralized listing & delisting by blockchain consensus.
